current.page_msg:
In order to manage or cancel your subscription, you will need to create an account login this doesn’t happen automatically just by purchasing.

👉 If you don’t remember going through the formal process of creating an account and setting up your password, please click "Create an account" to get started be sure to use the same email you used at the time of purchase.

From there, you can skip your next refill or cancel your subscription by going to "Manage subscriptions" > click "subscriptions" > scroll down and click "cancel subscription" or "skip"

If you have any issues accessing or managing your subscription your account please email support@getklora.com. Thank you!
current.discount_msg: 1ST MONTH'S DISCOUNT 50% *Recurring subscription charge will be regular price, cancel anytime.

Combine Gut-Renew and Bloat-Digest every day for a synergistic effect!

Build Lean Muscle | Burn Fat | Recover Quicker | Boost Cognition

settings.popup_newsletter_description:
Subscribe to the Molla eCommerce newsletter to
receive timely updates from your favorite products.

settings.desc_newsletter: Each month, we'll share 1-2 pieces of health & wellness related content that we think you'll enjoy, as well as keep you up-to-date on our latest promotional efforts.

settings.img-txt: “I recommend Create's gummies to all of my personal training clients!"
“I was afraid to take creatine, but Create's gummies have worked wonders."
“No more powders or digusting pills. Just convenient, tasty and effective gummies."
“I love that Create's gummies are vegan and low sugar. Such a fun way to get my creatine!”
“Who knew that creatine gummies would take my yoga practice to the next level!”
“Looking and feeling better. Enough said. And oh yeah, the gummies are fun to take!"

settings.heading: See how we stack up against other creatine brands

settings.b-txt: Consistent, automatic shipping so you never miss a day. Cancel or pause anytime.
Subscribe once and relax. All your shipping expenses are covered by Create when you subscribe!
Gain exclusive, subscriber-only benefits. Enjoy early access to new products, special promotions, and surprise perks.

settings.pdp-lin1: Best used for daily maintenance (2-3 gummies per day)
Full benefits of creatine supplementation (2-3 gummies per day

settings.v1-pdp-lin1: Best used for daily maintenance (2-3 gummies per day)
settings.v2-pdp-lin1: Full benefits of creatine supplementation (2-3 gummies per day)

settings.heading: Explore Our Offerings
settings.sub-heading: Our gummies are designed to be taken everyday. Explore what the best option is for you - and don't worry, shipping is free!

settings.t-txt: Dr. Abbie Smith-Ryan (Prof. & Dir. of Human Performance at UNC Chapel Hill)
settings.q-txt: "Creatine is one of the single most effective ingredients for improving overall health and quality of life. Until now it’s settled at the bottom of your drink or it’s mixed with other less effective ingredients. Create has taken feasibility to a whole new level."

settings.accordion_title: What is creatine?
settings.accordion_info: Creatine is an amino acid most commonly found in your muscles and brain. Creatine is naturally produced in your body and is also consumed when eating meat. It is the most studied fitness supplement on the market, and research shows it can increase strength, improve recovery, and boost mental acuity.

settings.accordion_title: Is creatine safe?
settings.accordion_info: Yes, creatine is safe! The FDA issued a GRAS (Generally Recognized as Safe) rating on Creatine Monohydrate in 2020, putting it in the same category as other common supplements like vitamin C and whey protein.

settings.accordion_title: What are the main benefits of creatine?
settings.accordion_info: The main benefits of creatine are increasing strength, building muscle, muscle recovery, and improved mental acuity.

settings.accordion_title: When will I see results?
settings.accordion_info: You may experience the benefits of creatine supplementation within 2-3 weeks.

settings.accordion_title: Who should take creatine?
settings.accordion_info: Creatine supplementation can be beneficial for almost anyone. It is most beneficial if you live an active lifestyle, but it can increase mental acuity and improve body composition even if you do not.

settings.accordion_title: How should I take my creatine gummies?
settings.accordion_info: To experience the full benefits of proper creatine supplementation, we recommend taking 3-5 gummies once per day, every day. If you are using our gummies as a dietary replacement supplement, 1-2 gummies once per day matches the average daily meat-based diet.

settings.heading: Our Community
settings.sub-heading: Check out videos from acutal users and hear what they have to say about our products.

settings.tab-content: THE TRUTH: Creatine "bloating" is the result of increased muscle hydration. The "bloating" is most common during a loading phase. Our gummies are designed to be taken without loading.

THE TRUTH: In 2020, the FDA gave creatine monohydrate a GRAS Rating (Generally Regarded as Safe), putting it in the same safety category as Vitamin C and Whey Protein. It's also the most researched fitness supplement on the market with over 700 peer reviewed studies.

settings.tab-title: Myth: Creatine is only for men
settings.tab-content: THE TRUTH: Creatine is a beneficial for both men and women. Creatine's benefits are broadly desirable for anyone that lives an active lifestyle.

settings.heading: Science vs Myth
settings.sub-heading: Creatine has a stigma. We're here to provide the science-backed facts.

settings.heading: Not sure if it’s right for you?

settings.accordion_info: Creatine is an amino acid most commonly found in your muscles and brain. Creatine is naturally produced in your body and is also consumed when eating meat. It is the most studied fitness supplement on the market, and research shows it can increase strength, improve recovery, and boost mental acuity.

settings.accordion_title: Is creatine safe?
settings.accordion_info: Yes, creatine is safe! The FDA issued a GRAS (Generally Recognized as Safe) rating on Creatine Monohydrate in 2020, putting it in the same category as other common supplements like vitamin C and whey protein.

settings.accordion_title: What are the main benefits of creatine?

settings.q-txt: Creatine supplementation increases your body's stores of phosphocreatine, which is used to produce new ATP during high-intensity exercise. ATP is the energy-carrying molecule found in the cells of all living things.

settings.heading: A unique blend of ingredients
settings.sub-heading: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipiscing elit cras malesuada odio ac nis.

settings.heading: Backed by science
settings.sub-heading: Creatine monohydrate is the most researched fitness supplement on the market. Here's what the science says:

settings.accordion_title: What is creatine?
settings.accordion_info: Creatine is an amino acid found in your body’s muscles and brain. The body naturally produces creatine and it can be consumed through meat. It is the most studied fitness supplement on the market, and research shows it can increase strength, improve recovery, and boost mental acuity.

settings.accordion_title: Is creatine safe?
settings.accordion_info: Yes, creatine is safe! The FDA issued a “GRAS” rating on Creatine Monohydrate in 2020, which means creatine monohydrate is “Generally Recognized as Safe.”

settings.accordion_title: What are the main benefits of creatine supplementation?
settings.accordion_info: The main benefits of creatine are increasing strength, building muscle, muscle recovery, and improved mental acuity.

settings.accordion_title: How does creatine monohydrate compare to other creatine variants?
settings.accordion_info: Creatine monohydrate is far and away the most research and trusted type of creatine on the market. When most people say creatine, what they really mean is creatine monohydrate. There is not significant research on other types of creatine, and we do not recommend taking other types.

settings.accordion_title: When should I take creatine?
settings.accordion_info: Creatine should be taken daily! There is no “right” time to take creatine, but we recommend taking it at a consistent time each day.

settings.accordion_title: How should I take my creatine gummies?
settings.accordion_info: To experience the full benefits of proper creatine supplementation, we recommend taking 2-3 gummies once per day, every day. Each gummy now contains 1.5 grams of creatine monohydrate. Drink plenty of water.

settings.accordion_title: When will I see results?
settings.accordion_info: You may experience the benefits of creatine supplementation within 2-3 weeks.

settings.accordion_title: Can women take creatine?
settings.accordion_info: Yes, in fact research shows that women may benefit the most from proper creatine supplementation.

settings.accordion_title: Does creatine have any negative side effects?
settings.accordion_info: There are few negative side effects of creatine. Some people report stomach discomfort or water retention during the initial supplementation phase. There is little evidence to support that creatine causes hair loss, increased fat, or kidney damage.

settings.accordion_title: Do I need to "load" your creatine gummies?
settings.accordion_info: No, we do not recommend “loading” on our gummies. Loading may potentially expedite results, but will increase stomach discomfort and may result in temporary bloating. Just take 2-3 gummies and you’ll muscles will be properly saturated with creatine in 2-3 weeks.

settings.accordion_title: Are the gummies vegan?
settings.accordion_info: Yes, our gummies are made using a pectin vegan base!

settings.accordion_title: Are the gummies keto?
settings.accordion_info: Each gummy contains 2.5 grams of carbohydrates. A full serving contains 5-7.5 grams of carbohydrates. Depending on the strictness of your keto, you may be able to take our gummies!

settings.accordion_title: Are your gummies safe for children?
settings.accordion_info: We don't recommend anyone under the age of 18 take our creatine gummies or any other dietary supplement without first consulting with a medical professional.

settings.accordion_title: Why should I take creatine in a gummy?
settings.accordion_info: Research shows that creatine supplementation may be more effective when matched with a carbohydrate. Additionally, the gummy is a delicious and convenient way to get your daily creatine.

settings.accordion_title: Why is your product more expensive than other creatine products?
settings.accordion_info: Creatine is one of the most affordable fitness supplements on the market. Our gummy is more expensive than most other alternatives due the convenient, delicious gummy form factor and the quality of our ingredients.

settings.accordion_title: Do you ship outside the US?
settings.accordion_info: We currently only serve customers in the US! If you live outside the US and want to try our product, email us at hi@trycreate.co

settings.accordion_title: How long does shipping take?
settings.accordion_info: Orders take 1 business day to process and 3-5 business days to arrive at your address. We design our subscription so your replenishment orders arrive on time!

settings.accordion_title: What is your return policy?
settings.accordion_info: You will receive a full refund if our product or service does not meet your expectations.

settings.accordion_title: Do you have a referral program?
settings.accordion_info: Yes, go to “Refer a Friend” on our homepage to learn more!

settings.accordion_title: Do you have an affiliate program?
settings.accordion_info: Yes, if you are interested in becoming an affiliate for Create – email us at affiliate@trycreate.co

settings.accordion_title: Can I place a bulk order for my business or team?
settings.accordion_info: Yes, email us at hi@trycreate.co. We offer discounts on bulk orders!

settings.accordion_title: Where can I follow you on social media?
settings.accordion_info: You can follow us on IG @try_create_ on TikTok @try_create_ or Twitter @trycreateco

settings.accordion_title: Do I need to "cycle" on and off creatine?
settings.accordion_info: Creatine is a safe supplement that should be taken every day over long periods of time. There is no need to “cycle” on or off like other supplements.

settings.accordion_title: What is Onward VIP Protection+?
settings.accordion_info: We’ve partnered with Onward to provide our customers with carbon neutral shipping protection and our 90-day satisfaction guarantee on your purchase. When you add Onward to your order, you’ll be protected against lost, stolen or damaged packages. You’ll also have 90 days after your purchase to trial your Create Wellness products. If you are dissatisfied with your Create Wellness products, Onward will work with us to make it right or refund your purchase.

settings.accordion_title: How does Onward work?
settings.accordion_info: Onward is an on-demand concierge service that covers our customers in the event they have shipping issues or are dissatisfied with their first purchase. If you add Onward to your order, you’ll be able to file a claim with just a few clicks and have the option of receiving a refund or a reorder based on the type of claim. Your claim will be reviewed for approval within an hour.

settings.accordion_title: How Do I File A Claim With Onward?
settings.accordion_info: You can quickly file a claim through the email that Onward sends you after you place your order, or you can file here.

settings.heading: Can’t find what you’re looking for?
settings.sub-heading: Email us at hi@trycreate.co. We'll try our best to answer your questions as soon as possible or find time to chat live!

settings.heading: Still need help?
settings.sub-heading: We try to respond to all messages within 24 hours!

settings.b-txt: Our mission is to improve the health and wellness outcomes of our customers through proper creatine supplementation. We stand for science, approachability, and product innovation.

Our vision is that 100 Million Americans are regularly taking creatine by 2030.

We believe that anyone who lives an active lifestyle can benefit from proper creatine supplementation. Due to a variety of factors (stigma, unenjoyable product experience, lack of awareness) only 2 million Americans regularly take creatine.

We have a long road ahead of us, but we hope you will join the movement!

We're not bodybuilders and have no desire to be! We spent years taking and studying creatine, and could never understand why more people didn't take it. In our experience and research, creatine was proven to be safe, effective and affordable. We launched Create Wellness to make creatine more approachable and to reverse the public's perception of the supplement. We are mission-driven founders that are obsessed with making creatine more accessible.

We would love for you to join us on this journey!

settings.q-txt: Creatine is made up of three different amino acids: glycine, arginine, and methionine. Creatine is naturally produced in your body and is also consumed when eating red meat, poultry, and fish.

settings.heading: Exclusive Early Access
settings.content: Reserve your spot on the waitlist before we launch the week of December 19th...and get 15% off your first month.

settings.q-txt: Apply to be one of Create's first wholesale partners! For accepted applicants, we'll send free samples, swag, and exclusive pricing lists. Join us in reversing the creatine stigma!
